DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacodynamic effect of single doses of MT-8554 in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Pharmacodynamic Effect of Single Doses of MT-8554 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy and free from clinically significant illness or disease Male Caucasian subjects aged 18 to 55 A body weight of â‰¥60 kg Participation in more than three clinical studies involving administration of an Investigational Medicinal Product (IMP) in the previous year, or any study within 12 weeks. Clinically significant endocrine, thyroid, hepatic, respiratory, gastrointestinal, renal, cardiovascular disease, or history of any significant psychiatric/psychotic illness disorder. Clinically relevant abnormal medical history, physical findings or laboratory values
